extension_copyright.message: Copyright 2011 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.

extension_description.message: View notifications of Google+ activity when signed in, anywhere you go on the web.

follow_promo_feature_1.message: When you visit a site connected to a Google+ page, a slider will appear on the side of the browser window. Hover over the slider to expand it and easily add the page to your circles.

follow_promo_feature_2.message: The notifications button in your browser will be badged with a "+" to indicate when you're viewing a site connected with a Google+ page. Clicking on the button shows your notifications just like it did before but now it will also display the related Google+ page information and provide a quick way to start following it.

follow_promo_feature_list_intro.message: Enhance your Google+ stream by following the Google+ pages that you find interesting:

follow_promo_following_description.message: Whenever a Google+ page is in your circles, all of the posts from that page will start appearing in your stream.

follow_promo_header.message: Discover Google+ pages while you browse the web

promo_message.message: New! Discover Google+ pages while you browse the web

send_usage_statistics.message: Automatically send anonymous usage statistics to Google

use_plus_follow_header.message: Notify me about the people and pages on Google+ associated with the sites I visit (Requires additional permissions)

use_plus_follow_note.message: The URLs of the sites you visit will be sent to Google in order to identify the Google+ profiles and pages linked to those URLs.

yada_yada.message: This isn't the usual yada yada:
